page.title: 10THE WELLCOME FOUNDATION 2
page.content: After the U.K. the chief areas supplied by Wellcome crewe are countriesin the eurpean economic community,the middle and for east,and africa. In the U.S.A Wellcome employs,more than 18,000 people world wide. It remains british-based with its headquartes in the Wellcome building in london.It consist sucess in acheiving 85% of its sales overseas had lead to the company receiving the Queens Award for export acheivement four times in the nineteen seventies Wellcome Crewe produces and packs liqiuds,tablets,creams antibiotic aerosols.The clunbury cottrel press prints for outside companies.There is a Medical and Consumer divsion Veterinar agricultural and Pesticides Divsion and the Industrial Hygiene Divsion also a Marketing services Division Market Research Publicity,
